snippet.title: Miitopia - Launch Trailer (Nintendo 3DS)
snippet.description:
Miitopia arrives on Nintendo 3DS family systems on July 28th!

Get hyped for your Miitopia journey with Miitopia: Casting Call, a hilarious personalised trailer now available to download from Nintendo eShop on Nintendo 3DS family systems.

#Miitopia #3DS #2DS

Official Website: http://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-3DS/Miitopia-1225809.html?utm_medium=social&utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=Miitopia%7CLaunch%7Cw30

Facebook Nintendo 3DS: https://facebook.com/Nintendo3DS
Twitter Nintendo UK: https://facebook.com/NintendoUK
Twitch Nintendo UK: https://twitch.tv/NintendoUK
Instagram Nintendo UK: https://instagram.com/NintendoUK
YouTube Nintendo UK: https://bit.ly/2cREWfu
